name: Unblinking Flame Fist
text: You can exploit the weaknesses in your opponents’ defenses, like a flame seeking fuel to consume.
prerequisites: Int 13; Wis 13; Combat Expertise; Perfect Style; Stunning Fist; Unblinking Flame Feint; base attack bonus +13 or monk level 13th.
benefit: When using Perfect Style, the save DC of your stunning fist attack increases by 2 against flat-footed targets. When you spend 1 ki point to gain the benefits of Improved Feint for 1 round, you can attempt a feint as part of your movement when charging.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points instead of 1 ki point when using Unblinking Flame Fist.
text_zh: 你能够如同肆虐的火焰一般充分利用敌人防守上的破绽。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，感知13，寓守于攻，无瑕流，震慑拳，业火袭，BAB+13或13级武僧等级。
benefit_zh: 若你正在使用无瑕流，措手不及的目标在对抗你的震慑拳时，震慑拳DC提高2点。当你你花费1点气来在1轮内获得精通虚招的好处时，可以在冲锋时将虚招的尝试作为移动的一部分。
staminaText_zh: 你可以在使用业火灼身时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。
